evidence.claim: EZ Scripts utilizes AWS services for cloud functionalities, including data storage and processing.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations for secure handling of health data.
Integration with EHR systems is part of their operational infrastructure for streamlined patient management.
Reference to X12 transaction sets indicates compatibility with industry-standard healthcare data formats.

icp.icp_reason: Uses HIPAA compliant tech with EDI transaction capabilities; potential for X12 exchanges.
